headline: Constellation Reaches Resolution With U.S. Department of Justice for Calpine Transaction
summary: BALTIMORE, December 05, 2025--Constellation announced it reached a resolution with the U.S. Department of Justice on the conditions required to complete the Calpine acquisition.

raw.headline: Constellation Reaches Resolution With U.S. Department of Justice for Calpine Transaction
raw.summary: BALTIMORE, December 05, 2025--Constellation announced it reached a resolution with the U.S. Department of Justice on the conditions required to complete the Calpine acquisition.

headline: Oklo Unveils $1.5 Billion Public Offering. The Nuclear Stock Sinks.
summary: Oklo  doesn’t have revenue but needs cash to build its nuclear powerhouses.  The energy start-up has struck a deal with a group of major banks to sell up to $1.5 billion worth of common shares through an at-the-market (ATM) equity offering program, the company disclosed to the government after Thursday’s market close.  A public offering often drags down a stock because the sale will dilute the holdings of current investors.

raw.headline: Oklo Unveils $1.5 Billion Public Offering. The Nuclear Stock Sinks.

The energy start-up has struck a deal with a group of major banks to sell up to $1.5 billion worth of common shares through an at-the-market (ATM) equity offering program, the company disclosed to the government after Thursday’s market close.  A public offering often drags down a stock because the sale will dilute the holdings of current investors.

headline: S&P 500 Pulls Back From Record as Bond Yields Rise
summary: The S&P 500 pulled back after crossing its Oct. 28 closing high. The market benchmark was up just 0.2% and losing steam as the morning rolled on. The Dow was up 136 points, or 0.3%. The Nasdaq Composite was up 0.
